Description: Limestone stela of Tjenia: he is represented in rough low relief, which is perhaps unfinished, standing and holding a bow in one hand and an arrow (?) in the other. There are two lines of text with incised signs, containing a simple funerary invocation to Anubis.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: B. Porter & R. Moss, 'Topographical Bibliography of Ancient Egyptian Hieroglyphic Texts, Reliefs and Paintings' III (Oxford: Clarendon Press), 67; Part I (2), 807.
Bibliographic references: James 1961 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc. Part 1 (pl.35)
